## Mod.getRenderContext() method

Get the mod's render context. This function should be invoked as soon as possible in the initialize callback. If `getRenderContext` is not called in the `initialize` callback, the mod will be automatically exported after one second.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRenderContext(): RenderContext;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`RenderContext`
